name: Destroy'em all
description:
COMMANDS

Press WASD to move, move the MOUSE to aim, press SPACE to interact with things and ENTER to start the game. When you are in the game, the mouse arrow is hidden by default, if you want to show it, you need to press ESC on your KEYBOARD.

ENEMIES

The goal of the game is to defeat all the enemies. In order to defeat an enemy, you will need to:

1. find a CONSOLE

2. interact with it by pressing SPACE;

3. press the button on the ENEMY's back before the time runs out.

CONSOLES

If the CONSOLE is not available, you will first need to activate it, by finding the relative CHIP. Once you find it, the CONSOLE turns automatically ON and you will be able to interact with it.

GATES

If you encounter a locked GATE, you have to find the relative CHIP that unlocks it and when you find it, you will need to interact with the CONSOLE next to the GATE.

You are not allowed to access all the gates. The ones that you are allowed to access are marked with a green arrow sign.

SAFE AREAS

You will spawn to a safe green area, where the ENEMIES can't hurt you.

If an enemy touches you, you will be pushed back to the last safe area you had encountered.

LIVES

When you are pushed back by an ENEMY, you will lose a LIFE.

WIN

Once you have defeated all the enemies, the game ENDS.

CREDITS

Thanks to Mister Y for the player's and enemy's icons.
